title: Get Involved with Builder Vancouver
description: Builder Vancouver runs because people pitch in with their time, gear, and ideas. If you want to help—even for a single meetup—we will plug you in quickly.
impactStatement: A lighter lift still matters: greeting guests, taking notes, or sending one recap email keeps the flywheel turning for the next builder night.

sections.title: What We Need Right Now
sections.body: We stay small on purpose, so clear ownership beats a long volunteer checklist. Pick one thing, own it for a month, and hand off notes to the next person.

highlights.title: Weekly Sessions
highlights.description: Set up chairs, welcome newcomers, and make sure demos run on time.

highlights.title: Builder Notes
highlights.description: Summarize wins in 3 bullet points so we can share them on social later.

highlights.title: Sponsor Touchpoints
highlights.description: Send a short thank-you after an event and capture what worked.

sections.title: How You'll Plug In
sections.body: Send the organizers a note with the role you want to try. We set up a quick call, add you to a signal thread, and walk through the single document you need for that role.

highlights.title: Fast Ramp
highlights.description: Expect a response within 48 hours with a 15 minute calendar link.

highlights.title: Transparent Scope
highlights.description: Every role has three bullet point outcomes and an owner for questions.

highlights.title: Builder Credit
highlights.description: We shout out volunteers in recaps, newsletters, and sponsor notes.

tracks.title: Event & Operations Crew
tracks.summary: Keep the room ready, speakers mic'd, and the schedule on track.
tracks.commitment: 2 hours on event night + 30 minutes of prep.
sampleContributions: Bring signage and make sure the check-in sheet is printed.
Run a two minute welcome so speakers can stay focused on content.
supportOffered: Slack thread with the core team

tracks.title: Content & Storytelling Guild
tracks.summary: Capture a quick recap so the wider community knows what shipped.
sampleContributions: Draft a 5 sentence event recap for the newsletter.
Clip one speaker quote for social and schedule it in Buffer.

quickStats.label: Active Contributors
quickStats.description: People currently rotating through light operations and content roles.

quickStats.label: Response Time
quickStats.description: We reply within two days with a short call invite.

contact.label: Reach the organizing team
instructions: Use the subject line "I Want to Help" so we can triage fast.
Include your name, areas of interest, and any relevant links (GitHub, LinkedIn, projects).
Let us know your availability and how soon you want to start contributing.

meta.title: Get Involved | Builder Vancouver
meta.description: Join Builder Vancouver's volunteer crew. Help run events, ship content, mentor builders, and grow the Bitcoin scene in the Pacific Northwest.
